verses.verse: תְּפִלָּ֗ה <S%H8605><s%> A Prayer לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David שִׁמְעָ֤ה <S%H8085><s%> Hear יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD צֶ֗דֶק <S%H6664><s%> the right הַקְשִׁ֥יבָה <S%H7181><s%> attend רִנָּתִ֗י <S%H7440><s%> unto my cry הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <S%H238><s%> give ear תְפִלָּתִ֑י <S%H8605><s%> unto my prayer בְּ֝לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> [that goeth] not שִׂפְתֵ֥י <S%H8193><s%> lips מִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> out of feigned

מִ֭לְּפָנֶיךָ <S%H6440><s%> from thy presence מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י <S%H4941><s%> Let my sentence יֵצֵ֑א <S%H3318><s%> come forth עֵ֝ינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> let thine eyes תֶּחֱזֶ֥ינָה <S%H2372><s%> behold מֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <S%H4339><s%> the things that are equal

בָּ֘חַ֤נְתָּ <S%H974><s%> Thou hast proved לִבִּ֨י ׀ <S%H3820><s%> mine heart פָּ֘קַ֤דְתָּ <S%H6485><s%> thou hast visited לַּ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> [me] in the night צְרַפְתַּ֥נִי <S%H6884><s%> thou hast tried בַל־ <S%H1077><s%> nothing תִּמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> me [and] shalt find זַ֝מֹּתִ֗י <S%H2161><s%> nothing I am purposed בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> nothing יַעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> shall not transgress פִּֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> [that] my mouth

לִפְעֻלּ֣וֹת <S%H6468><s%> Concerning the works אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> of men בִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> by the word שְׂפָתֶ֑יךָ <S%H8193><s%> of thy lips אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I שָׁ֝מַ֗רְתִּי <S%H8104><s%> I have kept אָרְח֥וֹת <S%H734><s%> [me from] the paths פָּרִֽיץ׃ <S%H6530><s%> of the destroyer

תָּמֹ֣ךְ <S%H8551><s%> Hold up אֲ֭שֻׁרַי <S%H838><s%> my goings בְּמַעְגְּלוֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H4570><s%> in thy paths בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> have not נָמ֥וֹטּוּ <S%H4131><s%> slip פְעָמָֽי׃ <S%H6471><s%> [that] my footsteps

אֲנִֽי־ <S%H589><s%> I קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <S%H7121><s%> I have called כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תַעֲנֵ֣נִי <S%H6030><s%> upon thee for thou wilt hear אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> me O God הַֽט־ <S%H5186><s%> incline אָזְנְךָ֥ <S%H241><s%> thine ear לִ֝֗י שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> unto me [and hear אִמְרָתִֽי׃ <S%H565><s%> ] my speech

הַפְלֵ֣ה <S%H6395><s%> Shew thy marvellous חֲ֭סָדֶיךָ <S%H2617><s%> lovingkindness מוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <S%H3467><s%> O thou that savest חוֹסִ֑ים <S%H2620><s%> them which put their trust מִ֝מִּתְקוֹמְמִ֗ים <S%H6965><s%> [in thee] from those that rise up בִּֽימִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> by thy right hand

שָׁ֭מְרֵנִי <S%H8104><s%> Keep כְּאִישׁ֣וֹן <S%H380><s%> me as the apple בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> first עָ֑יִן <S%H5869><s%> of the eye בְּצֵ֥ל <S%H6738><s%> me under the shadow כְּ֝נָפֶ֗יךָ <S%H3671><s%> of thy wings תַּסְתִּירֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5641><s%> hide

מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> From רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> the wicked ז֣וּ <S%H2098><s%> that שַׁדּ֑וּנִי <S%H7703><s%> oppress אֹיְבַ֥י <S%H341><s%> enemies בְּ֝נֶ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> me [from] my deadly יַקִּ֥יפוּ <S%H5362><s%> [who] compass me about עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and
חֶלְבָּ֥מוֹ <S%H2459><s%> in their own fat סָּגְר֑וּ <S%H5462><s%> They are inclosed פִּ֝֗ימוֹ <S%H6310><s%> with their mouth דִּבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> they speak בְגֵאֽוּת׃ <S%H1348><s%> proudly

אַ֭שֻּׁרֵינוּ <S%H838><s%> us in our steps עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> have now [סְבָבוּנִי כ] (סְבָב֑וּנוּ <S%H5437><s%> make ק) עֵינֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H5869><s%> their eyes יָ֝שִׁ֗יתוּ <S%H7896><s%> they have set לִנְט֥וֹת <S%H5186><s%> bowing down בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> to the earth

דִּמְיֹנ֗וֹ <S%H1825><s%> Like כְּ֭אַרְיֵה <S%H738><s%> as a lion יִכְס֣וֹף <S%H3700><s%> [that] is greedy לִטְר֑וֹף <S%H2963><s%> of his prey וְ֝כִכְפִ֗יר <S%H3715><s%> and as it were a young lion יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> lurking בְּמִסְתָּרִֽים׃ <S%H4565><s%> in secret places

קוּמָ֤ה <S%H6965><s%> Arise יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD קַדְּמָ֣ה <S%H6923><s%> disappoint פָ֭נָיו <S%H6440><s%> him הַכְרִיעֵ֑הוּ <S%H3766><s%> cast him down פַּלְּטָ֥ה <S%H6403><s%> deliver נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> my soul מֵרָשָׁ֥ע <S%H7563><s%> from the wicked חַרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H2719><s%> [which is] thy sword

מִֽמְתִ֥ים <S%H4962><s%> From men יָדְךָ֨ ׀ <S%H3027><s%> [which are] thy hand יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD מִֽמְתִ֬ים <S%H4962><s%> from men מֵחֶ֗לֶד <S%H2465><s%> of the world חֶלְקָ֥ם <S%H2506><s%> [which have] their portion בַּֽחַיִּים֮ <S%H2416><s%> in [this] life [וּצְפִינְךָ כ] (וּֽצְפוּנְךָ֮ <S%H6840><s%> hid ק) תְּמַלֵּ֪א <S%H4390><s%> thou fillest בִ֫טְנָ֥ם <S%H990><s%> and whose belly יִשְׂבְּע֥וּ <S%H7646><s%> [treasure] they are full בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> of children וְהִנִּ֥יחוּ <S%H3240><s%> and leave יִ֝תְרָ֗ם <S%H3499><s%> the rest לְעוֹלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5768><s%> of their [substance] to their babes

אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> in בְּ֭צֶדֶק <S%H6664><s%> in righteousness אֶחֱזֶ֣ה <S%H2372><s%> As for me I will behold פָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face אֶשְׂבְּעָ֥ה <S%H7646><s%> I shall be satisfied בְ֝הָקִ֗יץ <S%H6974><s%> when I awake תְּמוּנָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8544><s%> with thy likeness
